title: What are the best Nature Reviews papers? - Quora

response.answer_text: This question is lacking some context: best for what ? Are you a scientific looking to publish a review on your scientific or are you a student looking for good reviews to read ?  If you are triying to get published, the best Nature paper to be in is highly dependent of your area of expertise, if it's microbiology, then Nature Reviews Microbiology it is. But I'm more inclined to think you want to learn by reading reviews, which IHMO the best way to learn biology once you covered the basics. After that the reviews you should here is those you want to read. It doesn't matter if they come outside the nature publishing group. If you are interested in microbiology there are several sites where you can find great reviews on pathogens such as:  A Peer-Reviewed Open-Access JournalNature Reviews Microbiologyhttp://www.annualreviews.org/journal/virologyhttp://www.annualreviews.org/journal/microRead on what you like and what you need for your study or your work. Don't hesitate to follow links and discover new topics. I hope you'll have fun.
